org.dkpro.statistics.agreement.visualization

Class ReliabilityMatrixPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dkpro.statistics.agreement.visualization.ReliabilityMatrixPrinter

  • public class ReliabilityMatrixPrinter
extends Object
    Plain-text visualization for a reliability matrix as defined by Krippendorff (1980: p. 136). That is, a table showing one annotation item per column and the categories assigned to them by a certain rater. In addition to that, the reliability matrix sums the number of units with identical categories. For the example by Krippendorff (1980: p. 139), the implementation displays:
        1  2  3  4  5  6  7  8  9   Î£
 1  1  1  2  4  1  2  1  3  2 
 2  1  2  2  4  4  2  2  3  2 
 3  1  2  2  4  4  2  3  3  2 
                              
 1  3  1        1     1         6
 2     2  3        3  1     3  12
 3                    1  3      4
 4           3  2               5

    References:
    • Krippendorff, K.: Content Analysis: An Introduction to Its Methodology. Beverly Hills, CA: Sage Publications, 1980.
    Author:
    Christian M. Meyer
    See Also:
    ICodingAnnotationStudy
